metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13701 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect implementation in navigation in Google Chrome prior to 78.0.3904.70 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
